    • Uses of PersistenceToolsHelper in com.tangosol.coherence.dslquery.internal

      Methods in com.tangosol.coherence.dslquery.internal that return PersistenceToolsHelper 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static PersistenceToolsHelper PersistenceToolsHelper.ensurePersistenceToolsHelper​(ExecutionContext ctx)
      Ensure a PersistenceToolsHelper exists within the CohQL ExecutionContext which can be used to issue cluster related Persistence commands.
